API Reference

The iesve module is imported as:

import iesve

The iesve module has a single module-level function and many classes.

—

iesve.get_application_folder()
Returns:

The absolute filepath of the directory of the VE instance.

Return type:

str

class iesve.VEProject

Represents an IES-VE project.

Also see:

  • How to access the current project

—

classmethod get_current_project()
Returns:

Returns the project currently loaded in the VE.

Return type:

VEProject

content_folder

Return type:

str
